body.name: MOUTHWATCHERS Dr Plotkas Extra Soft Flossing Toothbrush, Folding Travel Toothbrush for Adults, Ultra Clean Toothbrush, Good for Sensitive Teeth and Gums, 1 Toothbrush
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 3 mins
features: SOFT BRISTLE TOOTHBRUSH Dr Plotka’s toothbrush is quite simply the BEST.BRUSH.EVER. TM! The extra soft, multi-layered bristles break up plaque and sweep away food and residue that other brushes miss - leaving your teeth looking bright and feeling noticeably cleaner, every time you brush. Pair with Dr Plotka’s 100% naturally-sourced Whitening Toothpaste for the ultimate brushing experience!

SILVER INFUSED TRAVEL TOOTHBRUSH Each polyester bristle is infused with silver, which naturally eliminates the buildup and debris that linger on most toothbrushes. Within 6 hours of using your brush, it’s fresh and clean, and ready for your next use. Unique foldable style makes this toothbrush the perfect travel companion, compact enough for any toiletry case or overnight bag. The folded brush also offers a convenient way to keep the bristles from getting dirty, while allowing them to dry.

FLOSSING TOOTHBRUSH The tip of each flossing bristle is one micron, the thickness of a single human hair. These long, soft, floss-like bristles are 10X thinner than other bristles and reach between teeth, under the gum line, and deep into the grooves where most cavities form – better than any other toothbrush you will find. Happy brushing!

SENSITIVE TEETH AND GUMS Soft polyester bristles are super gentle, perfect for sensitive teeth and gums. Polyester bristles are also longer lasting than traditional nylon bristles, so you can hold on to your brush for up to 4 months – 1 month longer than the typical toothbrush.

MOUTHWATCHERS was founded over 15 years ago by Dr. Ronald Plotka, DDS, a nationally renowned dentist with over 40 years of dentistry leadership. Dr. Plotka is dedicated to making life healthier with unique dental hygiene products that combine superior quality with the very latest technology – and guaranteed results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Geat easy to use product
reviews.reviewText: Very compact and soft bristles. I recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sent wrong color to my happiness
reviews.reviewText: Ordered red cuz it was significantly cheaper and I actually wanted blue… and they sent blue. So just a warning that yours might not be what color you order. I’m as happy as can be though. 🤩 haven’t used it yet but was happily surprised that even though the pictures looked a little low quality the actual thing feels sturdy for a toothbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hey - a fine travel toothbrush at last!
reviews.reviewText: Well whattya know? I found a very good travel toothbrush. The hype on this is real. Worth it. It has "fine" (i.e., slender and strong) bristles, which if you can find a regular toothbrush - that's the way to go. Gets the tartar off as much as can be expected between your teeth.. The only drawback is: it is not fully "protected." I.E., the fold-in aspect allows for possible stuff to get in. So far, none has. But if they modified this feature, this would be as good as the toothbrush in my bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My mouth feels so clean!
reviews.reviewText: I can’t believe how much I love these toothbrushes. I found them when I was looking for a toothbrush that would get me out of flossing (I hate flossing). I previously used an oral B electric toothbrush. I was surprised at how sensitive my gums were when I started using this toothbrush, so it is definitely doing something my oral B wasn’t. I can feel the longer bristles going in between my teeth and even though all the bristles are so soft, my mouth feels cleaner than ever. I don’t think I can ever go back to anything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Maybe too hard
reviews.reviewText: This travel toothbrush is great as it's small and sturdy enough to withstand being shoved in an overloaded bag. I usually use an electric toothbrush at home and thought this would be a good travel alternative. It definitely is but it actually hurt my gums really badly. Sure, my gums are sensitive and stuff but my mouth hurt for hours after using. I feel squeaky clean but have painful swollen gums. My dentist has always told me I brush too hard so this may not be the best for me. Definitely clean but definitely hurts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shiny Teefs on the Go Will Be Yours!
reviews.reviewText: Compact, sturdy but soft bristles on this folding bad boy which will fit in your pocket, purse, backpack but prolly not your wallet. Unless you have a really roomy wallet! 4 in the pack so theres always another if you lose or leave yours somewhere if you’ve been out cattin’ around. Or you just want to give a couple away because they’re so fabulous. Buy these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the bristles on this toothbrush. It feels like a gum massage, but it really does a good job on my teeth. and it's portable too, which means I can keep it around as a reminder to brush my teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Little Travel Toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Having this little travel toothbrush in my purse, gives me a feeling of confidence, knowing I can brush my teeth when finished eating a snack or a meal. Great bristles, great scrub, for a nice smile.

I was confused because I thought the bristles were silicone or rubber but they are sort of like regular toothbrush bristles. The "flossing" part is they are extra thin on the end so they will easily go between teeth. Thumbs up on that. The folding part is cool. Not totally enclosed so I think it'll try quickly and hopefully the anti-bac part is true. That's the important part. All in all it seems really good for traveling and I would recommend it.
Dry fast and has the best cleaning function!

reviews.reviewTitle: Keep Dr. Plotka's folding toothbrush in my purse.
reviews.reviewText: It is the best toothbrush I have ever owned. I have a regular Dr. Plotka toothbrush in my bathroom and keep a folding one in my purse. It lasts a long time compared to a regular toothbrush.
